title: Ganbare! Moudouken Serve
synopsis: A TV special from December 1988 about a guide dog for the blind called Serv (サーブ). This dog lived in the real world, and died shortly before the anime production.
staff: [['Seki, Shuuichi', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Ookura, Masahiko', ['Key Animation']], ['Sakamoto, Nobuto', ['Art Director']], ['Iimura, Kazuo', ['Key Animation']]]
